explanation: Use this endpoint to create a new build quiz

parameters.name: chapter_ids
parameters.description: IDs for selected chapters to build a quiz

parameters.name: no_of_questions
parameters.description: No of questions. The number is limited to following values: 25, 50, 100 or All
